title.narrative: Enhancing Social and Economic Capacity of Farmer's Organisations

description.narrative: The project aims at enhancing social and economic capacity of farmer-based CBO that are working to increase agricultural production and income in the two provinces of Siem Reap and Otdar Meanchey. The key expected results are: 1- sustainable and climate-resilient agricultural production; 2- improved access to gender sensitive and inclusive financial services; 3- promoted women entrepreneurship; 4- strengthened farmers' organisation; 5- enabling policy environemnt for farmers, especially women.

"In total there are 246 people (175 female) involved in promoting sustainable and climate resilient agriculture production, including 119 people (88 female) in the provinces of Siem Rap, Otdar Meanchey and Preah Vihear, attended awareness raising on disaster risk reduction/climate change adaptation (DRR/CCA) and preparedness plan. However, total 68 farmers (54 female) trained on innovative agriculture techniques, including drip irrigation system, seed management, pest management. Separately, 9 model farmers trained on techniques of drip irrigation system, crop management, pest control and seed management. At the same time, six farmer-producer groups (2 vegetable producer groups and 4 chicken producer groups) were formed with total 50 members (28 female). More importantly, 4 chicken-raising groups of 36 members/18 women have practiced their raising activities focusing on producing chicken for meat, egg and chicks. 115 people (86 female) received education on the gender concept and gender roles and gender equality. Total 88 (72 female) in the provinces of Siem Rap, Otdar Meanchey and Preah Vihear were involved in Promoted Women entrepreneurship. However, 88 (72 female) of AC committee in Siem Rap and Preah Vihear were trained on community-based enterprise development and there are 13 females in the 3 target provinces that have been implementing their entrepreneurial activities such as fresh vegetable business, grocery, pock business, chicken. The Union of AC in Siem Reap attended fair trade event in Siem Reap town and they brought their community members' products such as milled rice, fresh vegetables, powder sugar, wild honey to display and sell at the event and introduce to market locally. "

activity-date.narrative: Planned end date of the activity
Planned start date of the activity
